title: How to Separate Nut Shells from the Nut Meats

steps.headline: Finish shelling the nuts as neatly as possible and away from the original mixing up of shell and meats.
Place the mixed up shells and meats into a bowl of water.
Wait for the nut meats to sink to the bottom.
steps.description: The shells and shell pieces are lighter and will float to the top.

steps.headline: Scoop out the shells with a sieve or slotted spoon that captures the shells but lets the water drop back.
steps.description: Continue until all shells have been removed.

steps.headline: Drain the water and drop the nut meats into a colander.
steps.description: Allow to dry and use as wished.
